product_name: The North Face Metropolis Gloves - Women's
long_description: The North Face Metropolis gloves feature PrimaLoft(R) insulation for great warmth in winter weather. Ripstop nylon shells feature PrimaLoft insulation in the palms and Heatseeker(TM) insulation at the backs of the hands. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Grippy synthetic palms. The North Face Metropolis gloves have comfortable knit cuff gaskets to keep warmth in.
